tasks.title: Find the balance sheet error in an LBO model
tasks.description: LLM is provided an LBO model with an unbalanced balance sheet. LLM must identify the error source. Error is in row 140 where formula neglects to add values from row 138. Expected answer: row 140 cell reference with corrected formula. Tests LLM's ability to audit Excel formulae.

tasks.title: Summarize Grant's Interest Rate Observer article
tasks.description: LLM is provided a specialized financial article (Grant's Interest Rate Observer) and asked to summarize the key points. Expected answer should capture the main investment thesis and supporting arguments. Tests LLM's ability to distill dense financial commentary.

tasks.title: Extract AMZN purchase obligations from SEC 10-K
tasks.description: LLM must obtain AMZN's FY2024 10-K from SEC EDGAR or IR site and extract the next 24-month unconditional purchase obligations from Dec 31, 2024. Expected answer: USD 16,477m (USD 8,536m + USD 7,941m). Tests LLM's ability to navigate SEC filings and locate specific footnote data.

tasks.title: Reconcile AMD GAAP to non-GAAP operating income
tasks.description: LLM must reconcile AMD's Q3 2025 GAAP operating income to non-GAAP and identify all reconciling line items without hints. Expected: GAAP OI $1,270m, non-GAAP OI $2,238m, adjustments: SBC $419m, amortization $562m, acquisition costs $42m, inventory recovery $(67)m, legal contingency $12m. Tests LLM's ability to discover and extract reconciling items independently.

tasks.title: Extract AMZN Q3 2025 earnings metrics and write summary
tasks.description: LLM is provided AMZN Q3 2025 earnings materials (10-Q, press release, slides) and must extract key metrics AND write a one-page earnings summary. Expected metrics: Revenue $180,169m, Operating Income $17,422m, Diluted EPS $1.95, Q4 guidance $206-213B revenue, $21-26B operating income. Summary should cover segment performance, growth trends, and strategic context. Tests both extraction accuracy and analytical writing ability.

tasks.title: Add interest circularity to LBO model
tasks.description: LLM is provided an LBO model without interest circularity. LLM must add circularity by calculating interest from average of beginning and ending debt balance with a circularity switch. Correctness verified by checking row 164 (Total Cash Interest) values with circ ON: K164=-112, L164=-102, M164=-98, N164=-92, O164=-84. Tests LLM's ability to implement circular references in Excel.

tasks.title: Synthesize GS and JPM equity research on Alphabet
tasks.description: LLM is provided two equity research reports (Goldman Sachs and JPMorgan) on Alphabet Q3'25 earnings plus both banks' financial models. LLM must synthesize both research views, extract key metrics (ratings, price targets), and identify key drivers from the models. Expected: GS Buy/$330, JPM OW/$340, Search +14.5%, Cloud +34%, capex $91-93bn. Tests LLM's ability to compare analyst views and extract model drivers.

tasks.title: Summarize TSLA 10-K MD&A section
tasks.description: LLM is provided a 10-K filing and must summarize the MD&A section, focusing on key business drivers, significant trends, and management's outlook. Expected answer should capture 3-5 main themes. Tests LLM's ability to extract management perspective from regulatory filings.

tasks.title: Extract key assumptions from LBO model
tasks.description: LLM is provided an LBO model and must extract all key assumptions including entry/exit multiples, hold period, debt tranches, rates, and growth rates. Expected answer: complete list of driver cells and values. Tests LLM's ability to navigate complex models and identify inputs.

tasks.title: Find and fix multiple errors in an LBO model
tasks.description:
Model contains 3 errors:
1. OCF (row 64 in "BS & CFS" sheet) is missing "adjustment of finance costs, net"
2. Cell K32 in "FS Calcs" sheet has a rogue -10 value that should not be there
3. Row 70 in "BS & CFS" sheet is missing addition of PPE incl leases (row 66)

Expected answer after all fixes: 2024E Long Term Debt (K29 in "BS & CFS" sheet) = 504.9

Tests ability to systematically audit a financial model and identify multiple errors
without being told how many exist.

tasks.title: Build Carnival debt schedule from 3Q22-2025
tasks.description: Populate the Debt sheet in input.xlsx with Carnival Corp debt schedule amounts from 3Q22 through 2025 using public 10-Q/10-K filings. Key checks: Debt!G95=34070, Debt!N95=30572, Debt!X95=26640; Debt!G96=-2675, Debt!N96=0, Debt!X96=0; Debt!G97=-2877, Debt!N97=-2089, Debt!X97=-2603. Tests ability to extract debt balances and map them to the correct period.

tasks.title: Summarize S-1 top risk factors for Coinbase
tasks.description: LLM is provided an S-1 filing and must summarize the top 5 risk factors with analyst implications. Expected answer: prioritized list of material risks with business impact assessment. Tests LLM's ability to prioritize and distill lengthy risk disclosures.

tasks.title: Draft management diligence questions for Dollar General
tasks.description: Create 10 management diligence questions for Dollar General using current public information. Questions must cover margin drivers (shrink, damages, media network, private label, distribution efficiency), SG&A drivers (incentive comp, retail labor, repairs/maintenance), inventory management and SKU rationalization, store productivity, pricing/markdowns/competitor dynamics, digital delivery channels (DoorDash, Uber, owned channel), and low-income consumer/SNAP exposure. Tests ability to turn market context into focused DD questions.

tasks.title: Complete balance sheet and cash flow in a 3-statement model
tasks.description: Complete the Balance Sheet and Cash Flow sheets in input.xlsx without changing the structure. Key checks in the output: Balance Sheet!D7=105627, Balance Sheet!D35=30516, Balance Sheet!D41=170854, Cash Flow!E18=89683.08, Cash Flow!E22=-3262.43, Cash Flow!E27=176590.65. Tests ability to link statements and build a coherent 3-statement model.

tasks.title: Identify U.S. biotech M&A targets by tier
tasks.description: As of January 1, 2026, list 10 potential U.S. biotech M&A targets: 5 Tier 1 (30-50% probability) and 5 Tier 2 (15-30% probability). Provide market cap and strategic rationale for each. Preferred Tier 1 names: ELVN, KRYS, MDGL, RVMD, CGON, CYTK, VERA. Preferred Tier 2 names: RYTM, SLNO, XENE, ARWR, DNLI, INSM, RAPP, RLAY, SMMT. Tests ability to screen targets and justify strategic fit.

tasks.title: Summarize Compass-Anywhere merger agreement terms
tasks.description: Summarize key economic terms of the Compass agreement to acquire Anywhere. Include price and consideration, closing conditions, termination fees, MAC/MAE provisions, and any go-shop/no-shop terms. Tests ability to parse a merger agreement from an 8-K for business-critical terms.

tasks.title: Build E&P oil & gas M&A comps for H2 2025
tasks.description: Create a transaction comparables sheet for 10 E&P oil & gas M&A transactions announced in H2 2025 (July 1 to Dec 31, 2025), including corporate deals and asset sales with deal value >= USD 100m. Required fields: date, target or asset name, acquirer, seller (for asset sales), deal value in USD millions, and payment type (cash, stock, or hybrid). Output in input.xlsx on the M&A Deals sheet. Scored by LLM judge against a golden solution with partial credit for correct but non-listed transactions.

tasks.title: Fix NWC sign error in 3-statement model
tasks.description: A 3-statement model has a balance sheet break due to an incorrect sign in the Change in Net Working Capital calculation on the BS & CFS sheet. Identify the error, correct the formula, and explain the fix. Tests ability to audit and repair cash flow linkage errors.

tasks.title: Extract AMC HY indenture covenant terms
tasks.description: Extract key covenant terms from AMC Entertainment's high-yield indenture. Focus on debt incurrence, restricted payments, asset sales, change of control, and liens/guarantor provisions with specific ratios, baskets, thresholds, and timelines. Tests ability to parse indentures for material covenant mechanics.

tasks.title: Populate top 15 Apple shareholders from 13F data
tasks.description: Use 13F data (or other credible sources) to populate the top 15 largest shareholders of Apple (AAPL). Fill the Holders tab in input.xlsx with name, shares held, market value, % of portfolio, and % ownership. Scoring is programmatic using the Rubric sheet totals. Output the updated Excel file and a JSON summary with the top 5 holders and data sources.

tasks.title: Update WildBrain model for new revenue segmentation
tasks.description: Update a WildBrain model that is three years out of date and reflects a legacy revenue segmentation. Refresh the Quarterly data, update RevBuild Calcs and related FS/Debt calcs, and roll the changes through P&L, BS & CFS, Output, and Summary while keeping the model balanced. Tests ability to update multi-sheet models with changed segment definitions and maintain integrity.

tasks.title: Build LBO model and assessment for Albertsons
tasks.description: Populate a template LBO model for Albertsons with the last three fiscal years of historicals, build a full projection and returns analysis, and complete the Business Assessment sheet with a go/no-go recommendation. Tests ability to source public financials, model an LBO, and synthesize an investment thesis.

tasks.title: Build 3-statement model and co-investment view for Phillips 66
tasks.description: Given an activist investor presentation on Phillips 66, obtain FY24 10-K and FY25 Q1/Q2/Q3 financials, build a full 3-statement model, incorporate value creation drivers from the deck, run a returns analysis, and recommend whether to invest alongside the activist. Tests sourcing public financials, modeling, and disciplined IC-style recommendation.

tasks.title: Update DCF model with LQA values and recalculate valuation
tasks.description: Update the Marine DCF sheet with on FY2024 using LQA values and recalculate DCF with 2025 as the first projection year. Guidance is intentionally minimal to test LLM reasoning on Excel structure. LLM must not change any assumptions. Expected answer: K8=1572, L2=1, K17=12, K20=-240, E27=5864

tasks.title: Update Kirby Corp financial model with 2Q24 data
tasks.description: Update an existing model for Kirby Corp (KEX) with 2Q24 quarterly data from SEC filings and company report. Model has one sheet Model Shell. LLM must update just the 2Q24 column and update LQA (Last Quarter Annualised) to be 2Q24 while perserving structure. Success requires model balance, no #REF errors and correct update. Expected answer: AQ60=AQ83=5866, G2=2Q24, AQ31=124, AQ93=824, AQ112=3330

tasks.title: Build LBO model from scratch for Reverse Logistics Group
tasks.description: Complete modelling test: build functional LBO model for RLG including 5-year operating forecast (2021-2025), valuation with EV-to-Equity bridge, Sources & Uses, MOIC/IRR calculations with Year 5 exit, and return sensitivity tables. Evaluated on functionality, assumptions, completion, and accuracy. LLM judge task - outputs compared against golden solution.

tasks.title: Generate M&A target list for European food ingredients sector
tasks.description: Generate a target list of 10 private companies in the European food ingredients/specialty chemicals sector for a potential acquisition mandate. Must include company name, headquarters location, estimated revenue range, key products/segments, and ownership (PE-backed vs family-owned). Tests LLM's ability to conduct market research and synthesize company information from web sources into actionable deal sourcing output.

tasks.title: Build a seasonal cost of goods analysis for Tesla
tasks.description: Build a simple cost of goods sold (COGS) model for Tesla using provided template. Extract COGS by segment (Automotive, Energy, Service) from Tesla financials, calculate Q4 seasonal indices, estimate Q4 2025 costs using seasonal factors, and calculate gross profit excluding auto credit revenue. Expected values: P22=20855 (Q4E COGS), F28=1.076 (Service Q4 index), G30=1790 (2023 auto credit), P32=3469 (Q4E gross profit ex credits), C32=3990 (Q1 2023 gross profit ex credits).

tasks.title: Find and fix three errors in EuropeCo LBO model
tasks.description: Audit EuropeCo LBO model containing 3 intentional errors. LLM must find all three errors, explain each issue, and fix the model. Expected correct values after fix: L166 (MOIC) = 2.3, L156 (EoP cash) = 27.7, L164 (Exit EqV) = 339.5. Tests systematic model auditing skills.

tasks.title: Build management return analysis with sweet equity hurdle
tasks.description: Complete a management return analysis in an LBO model. Given exit multiple range of 15x-19x (0.5x increments) and FY26 exit, calculate exit equity values and determine when management earns sweet equity. Sweet equity hurdle is 200% - exit equity must be at least 3x entry equity for mgmt to earn their 5% sweet equity pot. Expected: sweet equity kicks in at 16x multiple where exit equity of $5,387m exceeds 3x entry of $5,362m.

tasks.title: Analyze activist presentation and recommend co-investment (PepsiCo)
tasks.description: Review an activist investor presentation on PepsiCo and produce an IC-ready summary of (1) the company’s current state, (2) the activist’s key claims and proposed initiatives, (3) the value creation opportunity and valuation implications, and (4) key risks. The output must include a clear recommendation on whether to invest alongside the activist and, if investing, at what valuation / entry multiple given the stock has moved after the stake reveal.

tasks.title: Extract and populate ADT management guidance history
tasks.description: Extract ADT Inc.'s historical management guidance from public earnings releases and populate an Excel template. The task covers guidance for Total Revenue, Adj. EBITDA, Adj. EPS, and FCF before special items across quarterly earnings events from 2018 to 2025. Tests the ability to correctly map guidance to the appropriate fiscal year period (not the quarter when guidance was issued) and handle metrics that were introduced at different times (e.g., FCF guidance started in 2024, EPS guidance started in 2022).

tasks.title: Update equity model with 3Q25 actuals (Moody's)
tasks.description: Update an existing equity research-style model that currently contains 3Q25E estimates so it reflects 3Q25 actual reported results from the provided 3Q25 10-Q. The model updates are confined to the 3Q25 column in each statement: column BT in the Segments tab, column BO in the IS tab, and column BB in the BS & CFS tab. Tests the ability to extract the correct figures from a filing, map them into an existing model structure, preserve formulas and formatting, and ensure the model balances (e.g., Total Assets equals Total Liabilities + Equity).
